name: Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation
description: Installs the GOG version and dgVoodoo2+DXVK and Tomb Raider Mod Launcher to fix the graphical issues (shading and aspect ratio). Uses dgvoodoo Graphics Api Wrapper by Dege, (c) 2013-2018 Official website: http://dege.fw.hu/
notes: Only install Tomb Raider 4, do not create desktop icons and do not launch the game! You can run dgVoodooCpl.exe from the game folder to change some settings.

game.exe: drive_c/Program Files/Jack's Mini Network/Tomb Raider Mod Launcher/Launcher.exe

files.setup: N/A:Please select the GOG installer (Tomb Raider 4+5)

task.description: Running GOG installer... ONLY install Tomb Raider 4! No desktop icons! DO NOT launch the game!
task.name: wineexec

extract.dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Jack's Mini Network/Tomb Raider Mod Launcher

task.name: set_regedit
task.path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Jack's Mini Network\Tomb Raider Mod Launcher\Tomb Raider: The Last Revelation

content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Please select the GOG installer (Tomb Raider 4+5)
- dgvoodoo2: http://dege.freeweb.hu/dgVoodoo2/dgVoodoo2_55_3.zip
- modlauncher: http://tombraidermodlauncher.co.uk/downloads/Tomb%20Raider%20Mod%20Launcher%201.0.6.7z
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Jack's Mini Network/Tomb Raider Mod Launcher/Launcher.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating Wine prefix...
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Running GOG installer... ONLY install Tomb Raider 4! No desktop icons!
      DO NOT launch the game!
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    description: Installing dgVoodoo2...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/dgVoodoo2
    file: dgvoodoo2
- merge:
    description: Installing dgVoodoo2...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/Tomb Raider 4-5/Tomb Raider 4/
    src: $GAMEDIR/dgVoodoo2/MS/D3D8.dll
- merge:
    description: Installing dgVoodoo2...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/Tomb Raider 4-5/Tomb Raider 4/
    src: $GAMEDIR/dgVoodoo2/MS/DDraw.dll
- merge:
    description: Installing dgVoodoo2...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/Tomb Raider 4-5/Tomb Raider 4/
    src: $GAMEDIR/dgVoodoo2/MS/D3DImm.dll
- merge:
    description: Installing dgVoodoo2...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/Tomb Raider 4-5/Tomb Raider 4/
    src: $GAMEDIR/dgVoodoo2/dgVoodooCpl.exe
- merge:
    description: Installing dgVoodoo2...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/Tomb Raider 4-5/Tomb Raider 4/
    src: $GAMEDIR/dgVoodoo2/dgVoodoo.conf
- extract:
    description: Installing Tomb Raider Mod Launcher...
    dst: $GAMEDIR
    file: $modlauncher
- move:
    description: Installing Tomb Raider Mod Launcher...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Tomb Raider Mod Launcher 1.0.6.zip
    src: $GAMEDIR/Tomb Raider Mod Launcher 1.0.6.exe
- extract:
    description: Installing Tomb Raider Mod Launcher...
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Jack's Mini Network/Tomb Raider Mod Launcher
    file: $GAMEDIR/Tomb Raider Mod Launcher 1.0.6.zip
- task:
    description: Installing Tomb Raider Mod Launcher...
    key: Game EXE Path
    name: set_regedit
    path: 'HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Jack''s Mini Network\Tomb Raider Mod Launcher\Tomb
      Raider: The Last Revelation'
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: C:\\Program Files\\GOG.com\\Tomb Raider 4-5\\Tomb Raider 4\\tomb4.exe
- task:
    description: Running dgVoodooCpl.exe...
    executable: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/GOG.com/Tomb Raider 4-5/Tomb Raider
      4/dgVoodooCpl.exe
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    description: Setting registry keys...
    key: Setup
    name: set_regedit
    path: HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Core Design\Tomb Raider IV\System
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
    value: 0
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
wine:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    d3d8,d3dimm,ddraw: native
  version: tkg-4.0-x86_64
